cause.description:
Sarvodaya USA is facilitating individual and community development to meet basic human needs, reduce material, social and spiritual poverty, and enhance the quality of life for all.
1. 11 Million people have benefited from Sarvodaya's education, health and satination programs and self-help initiatives.
2. Sarvodaya USA supports programs in Nepal and Sri Lanka
3. All human beings must have access to resources to meet their basic needs
cause.mission: Sarvodaya USA currently works with Sarvodaya Shramandana Movement of Sri Lanka. We have been supporting the Movement's holistic development programs.
cause.name: Sarvodaya USA
